short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The best tool to capture the screenshot, record your screen. Annotate the videos & screenshots. An easy-generating link to share.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you are chatwhizz user and looking for the easiest way to take screenshot then there is a good news for you because  Chatwhizz Screenshot Extension is live now which allows the user to take instant screenshot of the web pages.

The question is why only the Chatwhizz Screenshot Extension  so there are so many reasons of using Chatwhizz Screenshot Extension as it is limited for the Chatwhizz user only so it is mandatory to be a Chatwhizz user.

This extension is quick and easy to use which helps the user to capture the screenshot, edit the screenshot and easily share to others as a media and link.

Lets have a look on feature of the Chatwhizz Screenshot Extension.

Crop tool
Drawing brush tool
Drawing line tool
Drawing arrow tool
Blur tool
Downloading tool
URL creating tool
Copy tool
Text tool
Undo option
